titleStmt.title: Whereas formerly the practical musick performed in this school on the act Saturday, and other times
titleStmt.author: University of Oxford.

notesStmt.note: Title taken from first three lines of text.
"Given under my hand this 6th day of July, 1671."
Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
